review:
Still a great iPhone in 2017, may lose some of its charm in 2018-19 only.  
Grab at a deal price and do yourself a favor - get a very durable case and
screen guard as this is still haunted by bendgate!  
Around 23GB storage is usable.  
No lags or issues on iOS 11.  
Everything else is same as other iPhone 6 out there.  
You know the deal with them all, so I need not chatter.  
Again, try to grab at a deal price - I got this for 19999.  
  
P.S.: If you’re ok with an even smaller screen size (highly unlikely, as this
one is very handy), go for the iPhone SE at similar price, as it has some
better specs than iPhone 6, particularly camera and performance.

Recieved a defective product. Problems with hearing callers. When on speaker
mode, caller can't hear me and on normal mode, caller voice is very feeble but
they can hear me ok.

Buying a product that has been released in 2014 in 2017 doesn't make much
sense... At this price point you can go for many feature rich Android phones
and if screen size isn't an issue, then iPhone 5SE is a wise choice as it has
many features of 6s. BUT if you are looking for the prestigious apple
branding, screen size, the reliability of ios, updates for at least another
2-3 years at a pocket friendly price.. then 6 is a wise choice... (Strongly
recommended to go for 32GB or 64GB variant)

Apple been best from beginning. If you are bored from android just jump to ios
or bbos. And its best. Enjoying using iPhone 6. 32gb is way alot storage for
me. Camera is just awesome, focus is perfect. Low lighting mode is some what
hazzy. But other else its best.

It was very unfortunate to have such bad experience from Amazon for a niche
product like iPhone 6. The phone came with a faulty earpiece. It was giving a
hazzy sound while calling. I wasn't able to hear the person on call at all.
Also when using apple earphones, the same sound Crips into ears. It was so
irritating that it spoiled my love for apple product which I dreamt of buying
one day. I really hope Amazon take it on serious note and work on their
retailers before exposing them to customers. It was surely a faulty at
retailers end. There is reason why people choose Amazon over Flipkart and
Amazon should really maintain that trust factors.

review:
Iphone 6 in mid 2017 sounds bit old.  
But this phone preformes like a beast.  
Iphone doesn't need 6gb or 8gb rams bcoz the ram management is so good.  
The camera is still the same from iphone 5s but great than lots of phones in
same price range. Good phone go for it.  
Thumbs up to Amazon for great service and genuine products.

Amazing service by Amazon and the vendor. Initially it was stated that
delivery will be made within 4 days. But, to my surprise, it was delivered the
very next day. Got this on Amazon grand sale at a good price. Therefore,
expected a phone which was manufactured last year. Was glad to see that the
phone which was delivered was manufactured in July only. Absolutely new phone
with all the valid documents. Pretty impressive.

Really good, I bought it for my brother. it's very handy for everyone and
light weight. And thank to Amazon customer care service really helpful.

Hi All, I am very much disappointed with the set I received, I purchased it in
last week of september 2017, and since this first week of December 2017 its
getting so much pain, I dont know I have not downloaded much of apps, not even
1 mp3 or vedio songs, then too its getting freez while using simply, I am also
unable to pick up the call at one go, and once I press power button, then call
gets disconnected.  
please AMAZON, if you can do something with my handset. As this is ust 2
months and I am not supposed to get soo many issues.

Well, this might sound a bit weird, but the 32 GB version is noticeably slower
than the 16 GB version ! I had been using the 16 GB version of iPhone 6 since
a year and the less capacity of 16 GB made my phone memory full most of the
time. Thats when apple released the 32 GB version for around 28k and I was
attracted to that. I gave off my 16 GB iPhone to my mother and I started using
the 32 GB one. Its been around 7 months of using the new 32 GB iphone, but one
thing i found out was my old 16 GB version is much faster that than 32 GB
version ! The difference is easily noticeable when I use my new 32 GB and my
old 16 GB phone back to back. The 16 GB one opens the apps very fast and is
very quick to respond. But my new 32 GB phone has a lag when opening apps and
switching apps. I thought this was an issue with my specific phone. Last month
my wife also bought a 32 GB gold iphone 6 and it also is slower. I think apple
has made some compromises in the hardware to bring the cost down in the new 32
GB versions. Im disappointed with this.

I wouldn’t advise anyone to buy a i phone online. Better buy it through an
Authorized Premium Dealer over the counter, even its for a higher price.
Bought this phone in exchange to my old I phone 6. It’s been giving problems
from day one. Intermittently the touch doesn’t respond, message through the
contacts doesn’t function properly and many more. I got to know that the
latest I phone bought online have many issues. Looks like the dealers are
selling us some second defective tested piece which probably after some
initial repair is been kept to be sold to countries like India.

Head phone port is not working. I have to return it

Neat and well designed phone with an exceptionally good RAM handling better
than devices who claim 4 GB RAM and die on performance when you do multi-
tasking. Battery back up is awesome last for almost 2 days, charge super fast.
Headphone quality is good as well. This is my second purchase of iphone6
within 6 month - i plan to purchase after seeing performance of first one!
Camera and it modes are good, flawless. Will recommend to buy this one if you
want to have a taste of iPhone

The delivered iPhone 6, is not in good condition.  
The display seems to be not in good conditions, looks like there is some
manufacturing defect or it might be an refurbished product. I want to send
back this product and have this replaced with brand new iPhone 6.

The phone is okay. But I think I may have received a defective piece. It's day
three of me using this phone and I am not able to hear anything on a phone
call. When I keep the call on the hands-free mode (loudspeaker) the other
person can not hear me at all. It's a speaker and mic issue. I am thinking of
exchanging it. But apart from this very fundamental feature of a phone, this
phone is pretty neat. Got it for Rs. 25,125
